description: Checks whether the project name is available in the specified region.

parameters.description: Properties needed to check the availability of a name.

name.description: The name to check for availability

type.description: The resource type. Must be set to Microsoft.Migrate/projects

location_name.description: The desired region for the name check.

api_version.description: Standard request header. Used by service to identify API version used by client.

subscription_id.description: Azure Subscription Id in which project was created.
